messages.already_registered_email: User with this email is already registered. Please, use password remind function or contact support for help. If there is a mistake, please, contact support. Thank you.
messages.email_cannot_be_empty: You are using an email and a password to access the website. Email cannot be empty.
messages.verification_link_sent: A link to verify email has been successfully sent to %s
messages.verification_link_not_sent: An error occured while trying to send a verification link to %s
messages.verification_link_bad: Wrong data provided to verify an email.

verify_em.name: Email verification on a website «%s»
verify_em.base_text:
Good day!

We've received a request to register a user with your email on a website «%s».

To verify current email, please, follow the link: %s.

If you haven't registered on the website, please, ignore the current message.

Have a nice day.
